text: Amruta,  If you are later going to need more modules and prebuilt UI elements, you can always plug in and utilize a front end framework like UI Kit. I find this works better than most of the elements in the HubSpot marketplace and its lightweight.  It doesn't conflict with HubSpot because the classnames are unique.  I have used this to create tabs with sliders, videos, and more, Best of luck!  <https://getuikit.com/>
